Bio

My name is Constantin Tofan and I am a developer. To say that I love programming is a BIG understatement, I spend almost every waking hour building something fun or watching tech talks. Writing good code and developing high-quality applications is my profession and main past time. Currently, I do my frontend web development with tools like React, Sass, jQuery, and Javascript. If I am doing backend development my preferred choice is Node.js and Express.js.I’m constantly learning web technologies and other web programming related topics, currently playing around with Javascript and React. I’m a skilled in many areas of design and development. Some of my skills include:

  • HTML5, CSS3
  • Responsive Web Design
  • Bootstrap and Foundation frameworks
  • Javascript, Express.js, React.js
  • MongoDB, API, JSON, Github, Deployment
